commits.content:
import os

MODEL_NAME = "qwen2.5:7b"
RAW_DIR = "raw_contents"
os.makedirs(RAW_DIR, exist_ok=True)
FAISS_PATH = "faiss_index"
MAX_URLS = 10
MAX_DISPLAY_CHARS = 1000  # For cleaned text display
